column1: Uchi////Everything we ordered was on the salty side
column3: which was DIVINE! The portions are tinyyyy. They said the concept is tapas
column4: but it was literally 1 bite per person. Our total bill was more than $250
column6: but we were still hungry afterwards and had to go get pizza and beer at Axelrod. The bar is limited to their mixed drink menu and beer/wine/sake. We ordered several sake mixed drinks and they were very weak
column7: so you should probably stick to beer/wine.
